C

clamp(float, float, float) - Static method in class util.Util
Clamp a value to a certain range
colorWithVariation(Color, int) - Static method in class util.Util
Get a colour with a certain variation in the components
convexPolyCollision(ConvexShape, ConvexShape) - Static method in class util.Util
Tests for collision between two convex polygons according to the separating axis theorem (SAT).
Bounding rectangles of the polygons are first checked for slight performance improvements.
cosf(float) - Static method in class util.Util
Convenience method to save you from casting.
